## {{< fa box-open title="an open box" >}} Anticipated deliverable(s) {#anticipated-deliverables}

By the end of today's class, you should have: 

- a blog listing page as a new navbar tab on your Quarto website
- the skeleton of your first blog post

## {{< fa clipboard-list title="a clipboard with a To Do list" >}} Pre-class Prep {#pre-class-prep}

Please be sure to complete the following before class:

- [**Consider which blog listing page type you'd like to use.**]{.teal-text} A blog listing page is a web page that displays all of a blog's posts. Quarto provides [three built-in listing page types / styles](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#listing-types){target="_blank"} to choose from. Check out the previews and identify which you might want to use ahead of class.
